name: 蒼葉
message: "Ouch..."
A few minutes later, we're sitting quietly at the dining room table.

My head throbs where Granny hit me.<k>
<?>
Of course, I'm not the only one with fresh lumps.
She gave us all a taste of knuckle pudding, saying we were all equally at fault.
I was a bit scared that the blond guy was gonna hit back, but he just stood there and pouted.
Why? Because she's a frail old woman? Though 'frail' might not be the best word to describe her...
When Granny asked how this all happened, I confessed that I left the front door unlocked again.
That earned me another lump.
I'm never forgetting to lock the front door again.

name: クリア
message: "To think I'd have the honor of sharing your punishment."
Come to think of it, I'm pretty sure the guy in the gas mask said his name was Clear.
He's just as fishy as the blond guy...

name: タエ
message: "Aoba, come here!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Coming."
I stand, rubbing the lump on my head, and head into the kitchen.
Granny is holding a basket full of freshly fried donuts. I thought I smelled something sweet.

name: タエ
message: "Bring these to the table. Everyone's fine with tea, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. Oh, by the way, Granny..."

name: タエ
message: "What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Should you be up already? How's your back?"

name: タエ
message: "I'm on my feet, aren't I? Stop asking stupid questions and get your butt in gear."
I set the basket of donuts on the table, then pour cups of tea for everyone and return to my seat.
Granny joins us shortly thereafter.

name: タエ
message: "It's hard to stay angry on a full stomach, so eat up."

name: 紅雀
message: "I thought I smelled something delicious! You know how much I love your donuts, Ms. Tae."

name: タエ
message: "Just hurry up and eat."
Koujaku goes straight for the basket.
The blond guy and Clear, on the other hand, just stare at the donuts in confusion.

name: タエ
message: "Eat 'em or don't. Make up your minds."
Clear can't eat without taking off his mask, and the blond guy doesn't seem interested.
Or so I thought. Surprisingly, despite his grumpy expression, the intruder reaches for a donut.

name: ノイズ
message: "It's sweet."

name: タエ
message: "Of course it is. What other kind of donut is there?"

name: ノイズ
message: "But it's sweet."

name: タエ
message: "If you don't like it, don't eat it."
Granny snorts, and the man continues nibbling on his donut. I can't get a read on him at all.
I turn back to Clear. He's still sitting there, motionless.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aren't you gonna have one? Granny's donuts are delicious."

name: クリア
message: "I will."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then I guess you'd better hurry?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes, I will."
Clear keeps perfectly still.
He'll have to take the mask off to eat, but will he?
I watch Clear over the rim of my teacup, wondering what's gonna happen.
A donut is missing from Clear's side of the basket.
And... it looks like his mask is moving up and down.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You... Did you just eat one?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. It's delicious."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You really are a magician."
He ate it with the gas mask on? How?
...Forget it.
I grab a donut and start eating too.
Granny's donuts are delicious even when cold, but when they're fresh, they've got this mellow, flakey sweetness that just fills your whole mouth.
Koujaku has already finished and gotten up from his seat by the time I start eating my donut.
Just before he goes into the hall, he turns back and beckons to me.
I point to myself―me?―and Koujaku nods.
What's up?
I leave my half-eaten donut on the table and head out into the hall.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Phew. Man, talk about crazy."
I guess Koujaku wanted to get away from the bizarre atmosphere in there.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, you can say that again."

name: 紅雀
message: "Anyway, about Mizuki. Did you get ahold of him?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, I called him. He said he was fine... but he sounded kind out of it."

name: 紅雀
message: "Really?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Did something happen?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, remember when I messaged you about Mizuki acting weird? Truth is, some of my gang had a little disagreement with some guys from Dry Juice."

name: 紅雀
message: "Now, Mizuki was there at the time. Normally, he'd step in to sort things out, right?"

name: 紅雀
message: "This time, he just stood by and watched―with this dazed look on his face. I had to step in."

name: 紅雀
message: "It struck me as weird, so I asked him if he was okay. But he just told me to leave him the fuck alone."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mizuki said that?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. He didn't look like himself. It was like something was really eating at him."

name: 紅雀
message: "Do you have any idea what it could be? Has he been worried about anything lately?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Last time I went to his shop, he mentioned disappearances."

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh, right. The vanishing Rib gangs."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It seemed like it was really weighing on his mind."

name: 紅雀
message: "I've heard a lotta talk around town..."

name: ウサギモドキ
message: "Morphine! Morphine!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Huh?!"
I feel something against my back, then something falls to the floor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's... one of his!"
It's one of those cubes the rabbit guy had on his belt. Was it tucked into the hood of my jacket this whole time?!
The cube hops into the living room.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That asshole!"
Koujaku chases after the cube.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, you little shit. You were eavesdropping just now, weren't you?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Not like you were talking about anything worth keeping secret."

name: 紅雀
message: "Fuck you!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Like this disappearance shit. No one even does Rib anymore. You sure it's not just a sad attempt to keep it alive a little longer?"

name: 紅雀
message: "The fuck you say?"
Koujaku's voice shakes with anger.

name: 紅雀
message: "This is no joke, asshole. There really are people who haven't come back."

name: ノイズ
message: "Fuck if I care. If you're so scared, maybe you should quit."

name: 紅雀
message: "Motherfucker..."
Koujaku takes a step forward. The man shoots back an icy glare.

name: 紅雀
message: "What's your name, smartass?"

name: ノイズ
message: "You first. Common courtesy, yeah?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Where's a jackass like you get off talking about courtesy?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Forget it, then."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hold on. This doesn't need to get ugly. His name is Koujaku. And yours is?"

name: ノイズ
message: "...Noiz."

name: 紅雀
message: "I fucking hate little smartasses like you."

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't really give a shit what you think."

name: 紅雀
message: "Why you..."

name: タエ
message: "Enough."
Granny breaks her silence to end their standoff with a single word.

name: タエ
message: "If you wanna fight, take it outside. I'm tired of listening to your bickering."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Sorry, Ms. Tae."
Noiz glances at Koujaku, then stands without saying a word.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, where do you think you're going?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Home."
He marches out of the room.

name: タエ
message: "If you're done eating, the rest of you skedaddle too."
Clear stands and bows to us.

name: クリア
message: "Thank you very much. Goodbye, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, wait a second."
I follow Clear out into the hall.

name: クリア
message: "Yes, what is it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I dunno if there's gonna be a next time, but if there is, come in like a normal person."

name: クリア
message: "Normal?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't fall from the sky or come in through the balcony. Just come in through the front door, okay?"

name: クリア
message: "Why can't I come from the sky or the balcony?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's just weird, okay? And you're gonna give me a heart attack."

name: クリア
message: "Heart attack... I see. I think I understand."
Clear touches his chest.

name: クリア
message: "You mean this heart here, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh... Yeah, I guess..."

name: クリア
message: "I always learn so much when I'm with you, Master. Thank you very much."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Okay."

name: クリア
message: "Until next time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sure..."
Clear bows again, then leaves through the front door.

name: 紅雀
message: "What's the deal with that gas mask?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hell if I know..."

name: 紅雀
message: "I thought you knew him?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not exactly. At least, I don't think I do."

name: 紅雀
message: "You don't think you do?"
After giving me a look, Koujaku awkwardly rubs the back of his neck.

name: 紅雀
message: "Sorry about that earlier. I just kinda snapped. Tell Ms. Tae I'm sorry, would you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You apologized earlier. I think it's fine."

name: 紅雀
message: "And I'm sorry for going nuts like that in your room."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, it's not like that was your fault. I haven't seen you that pissed off in ages, though."

name: 紅雀
message: "I just hate guys like that, who think they're hot shit."
Koujaku sighs, looking a bit deflated.

name: 紅雀
message: "You know, it just hit me... He's in a Rhyme gang."

name: 蒼葉
message: "He is?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah. They're the Ruff Rabbits, I think. I remember seeing him when we got in a fight with some of their members."

name: 紅雀
message: "He knew I was in Rib, so it's probably the same guy. Man, now I'm really pissed off."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Rhyme has gangs too? I didn't know that."

name: 紅雀
message: "I think they only started forming them recently. Mostly it's to share information, I hear. Just doesn't sit right with me."
A lot of Ribsteez think of their gangs as family, but I guess Rhyme's different.
Dry, efficient―that's the impression I get of Noiz.

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, enough about him. I'll do what I can to help Mizuki. And you let me know the second you find anything out."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Got it."

name: 紅雀
message: "Later."
Koujaku raises a hand in farewell, then walks out the front door.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Phew."
I head back to my room feeling drained. So much happened today.
Oh, right. I forgot to tell Koujaku that Noiz was the one who forced me into that Rhyme match.
Probably shouldn't. That'll just give him another reason to pick a fight.
Wondering how things got so messed up, I open the door... and suddenly feel even more exhausted.
Holy shit, is my room a mess...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Dammit..."
Remembering Noiz's cocky attitude is making me mad all over again.
I decide to just pick up some things off the floor before flopping down on my bed.
I'll get the rest tomorrow. Too tired today.
I let out a sigh and close my eyes.
